newsitem.title: USA: Continental Air stake raised by FMR group.
newsitem.headline: Continental Air stake raised by FMR group.

text.p: A group led by FMR Corp said Thursday it raised its stake in Continental Airlines to 3,751,748 Class B common shares, or 7.85 percent, from 5.37 percent previously held.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net 641,100 Class B common shares bought between January 23 and February 3 at prices ranging from $28.0833 to $29.2241 per share.
The group holds the shares for investment purposes, the filing said. FMR Corp is the parent to Fidelity Management & Research Co, investment adviser to Fidelity Funds.
